select count(*) from user_info as a left join map_user_role b on a.id = b.user_id left join role_info c on b.role_id = c.id left join user_info d on a.create_user = d.id where a.`status` != 3
and a.user_name like concat('%',#{entity.userName},'%')
and a.nick_name like concat('%',#{entity.nickName},'%')
and a.phone like concat('%',#{entity.phone},'%')
and a.status = #{entity.status}
